title: The Shawshank Redemption

ratings.comment: A tale of hope and friendship.

plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: Breaking Bad

ratings.comment: One of the best Series ever made.

plot: A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine manufacturing drug dealer navigates the dangerous criminal underworld.

title: Pulp Fiction

ratings.comment: A wild ride from start to finish!

plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: The Godfather

ratings.comment: A mob epic for the ages.

plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

title: Schindler's List

ratings.comment: A film that leaves a lasting impact.
A powerful testament to the human spirit.

plot: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King

ratings.comment: Epic conclusion to an epic trilogy!

plot: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

title: The Pianist

ratings.comment: One of the most impactful films I've seen.

plot: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

title: The Matrix
plot: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Sherlock

ratings.comment: A brilliant modern take on the classic detective.

plot: A modern update finds the famous sleuth and his doctor partner solving crime in 21st century London.

title: The Dark Knight

ratings.comment: One of the best superhero films ever made.

plot: When the menace known as The Joker emerges, Batman must confront one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

title: Inception
plot: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

title: Stranger Things

ratings.comment: A fantastic blend of horror and '80s nostalgia.

plot: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief, and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.

Season 3.episodeName: The Case of the Missing Lifeguard

title: Forrest Gump

ratings.comment: A heartwarming tale of life and love.
Tom Hanks delivers an amazing performance.

plot: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate, and other historical events unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

title: The Green Mile
plot: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

title: Inglourious Basterds

ratings.comment: A wild ride from start to finish!

plot: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

title: Parasite
plot: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

title: Joker

ratings.comment: A dark and intense character study.
A tour de force in filmmaking.

plot: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime.

ratings.comment: A unique and gripping war film.

plot: Two young British soldiers during World War I are given an impossible mission: deliver a message deep in enemy territory that will stop 1,600 men, and one of the soldiers' brothers, from walking straight into a deadly trap.

title: The Irishman

ratings.comment: A mob epic with stellar performances.
A gripping tale of organized crime.
An epic journey through a criminal empire.

plot: An old man recalls his time painting houses for his friend, Jimmy Hoffa, through the 1950-70s.

title: The Mandalorian

ratings.comment: A great addition to the Star Wars universe.
A fresh take on the Star Wars saga.

plot: The travels of a lone bounty hunter in the outer reaches of the galaxy, far from the authority of the New Republic.

title: The Queen's Gambit

ratings.comment: A captivating story of chess and personal growth.
A must-watch for its unique subject.
A surprising gem of a Series.

plot: Orphaned at the tender age of nine, prodigious introvert Beth Harmon discovers and masters the game of chess in 1960s USA. But child stardom comes at a price.

title: Squid Game

ratings.comment: A unique and gripping survival story.
A social commentary wrapped in a thriller.
Kept me on the edge of my seat.

plot: Hundreds of cash-strapped players accept a strange invitation to compete in children's games. Inside, a tempting prize awaits with deadly high stakes.

title: Whiplash

ratings.comment: A gripping portrayal of ambition and obsession.
Incredible performances, especially by J.K. Simmons.

plot: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cutthroat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

title: The Social Network

ratings.comment: A riveting look at the birth of Facebook.
A fascinating dive into modern tech history.

plot: As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, he is sued by the twins who claimed he stole their idea, and by the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.

title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind

ratings.comment: A mind-bending journey through love and memory.

plot: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories.

title: La La Land

ratings.comment: A dazzling musical with great chemistry.
A beautifully crafted ode to Hollywood.

plot: While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an actress fall in love while attempting to reconcile their aspirations for the future.

title: The Grand Budapest Hotel

ratings.comment: A charming caper with Anderson's signature style.
A whimsical journey with a fantastic ensemble cast.
Anderson's visual storytelling at its best.

plot: A hotel concierge and a lobby boy become embroiled in the theft of a priceless painting and the battle for an enormous family fortune.

title: The Shape of Water

ratings.comment: A unique and enchanting love story.
A beautifully crafted film with standout performances.
Del Toro's imagination knows no bounds.
A captivating and imaginative love story.

plot: At a top-secret research facility in the 1960s, a lonely janitor forms a unique relationship with an amphibious creature that is being held in captivity.

title: Black Swan

ratings.comment: A psychological masterpiece with stunning performances.

plot: A committed dancer competes for the lead role in a production of Tchaikovsky's 'Swan Lake' only to be met with competition from a rival dancer who impresses as the seductive Black Swan.

title: The Revenant

ratings.comment: Visually stunning with a powerhouse performance by DiCaprio.
A brutal and immersive survival story.
A testament to the human spirit and determination.

plot: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road

ratings.comment: A thrilling ride through the post-apocalyptic wasteland.

plot: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search of her homeland with the help of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshiper, and a drifter named Max.

title: A Beautiful Mind

ratings.comment: A powerful portrayal of a brilliant mind.
A moving exploration of genius and mental illness.
A testament to the human spirit.

plot: After John Nash, a brilliant but asocial mathematician, accepts secret work in cryptography, his life takes a turn for the nightmarish.

title: The Departed

ratings.comment: A gripping and intense crime drama.
A Scorsese classic with a powerhouse cast.
A rollercoaster of suspense and betrayal.
A masterclass in tension and storytelling.
A crime drama that keeps you on the edge of your seat.

plot: An undercover cop and a mole in the police force attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

title: Vasile Versaci, cel mai bun pregratar gateste orez cu lapte!

ratings.comment: Nu am vazut un film mai bun in viata mea.

plot: Cel mai bun pregaratar pregateste uorez cu lapte pentru mafia uorezului si toti nepotii lui.

title: Bahoi sare de pe pod

ratings.comment: Cel mai bun film de actiune.

plot: Bahoi sare de pe pod. Titlul e un bun rezumat al filmului.

plot: Test Plot

plot: Test Plot
